h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Ashen Slumber Location
content: The Ashen Slumber spell can be found in the first cell within the Pagoda Realm, near the Lower Pagoda Shrine in The New West. However, you will need to interact with the hut in Sandgate Village - Village Entrance, just next to the entrance to the Valley of Despair Shrine area. Its on the first incline up the hill by that large door to the Shrine area.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Ashen_Slumber.md', within the main section titled 'Ashen Slumber', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Ashen Slumber Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Ashen Slumber spell can be found in the first cell within the Pagoda Realm, near the Lower Pagoda Shrine in The New West. However, you will need to interact with the hut in Sandgate Village - Village Entrance, just next to the entrance to the Valley of Despair Shrine area. Its on the first incline up the hill by that large door to the Shrine area.
